thread.title: From unexpected overshares to hilarious autocorrect fails, these are the funniest text messages sent by grandparents
thread.title_full: From unexpected overshares to hilarious autocorrect fails, these are the funniest text messages sent by grandparents

title: From unexpected overshares to hilarious autocorrect fails, these are the funniest text messages sent by grandparents
text:
'I'm practising your sex tape' From unexpected overshares to hilarious autocorrect fails, these are the funniest text messages sent by grandparents 
These elderly phone users have been making everyone giggle By SOPHIE ROBERTS Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments THESE grandparents have desperately been trying to keep up with technology – but have sadly made their family members cringe after sending some bonkers messages. 
From embarrassing typos to hilariously awkward questions, here’s a roundup of some of the best texts sent by pensioners… Taking it to the XXX-treme TNI Press You’ve gotta be kid-ding! TNI Press Giving her grandson a grilling TNI Press The gift that keeps on giving TNI Press Band to make you giggle TNI Press WORLD’S WORST KUNG FU MASTER 'Drunk' street performer tries to show off martial arts skills... but fails miserably Snap it! From laundry bursting into flames to sexy plans which didn’t quite work out… people are sharing their hilarious life fails on Snapchat D'OH IT YOURSELF! 24 hilarious DIY fails that will definitely make you want to call in the experts PHOTO BOMBSHELLS These hilarious selfie fails prove why you ALWAYS need to check what’s going on behind you before snapping that carefully posed shot 'Still a virgin' From awkward quotes to bad wardrobe decisions... 17 of the biggest yearbook fails ever On trend
